DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , Phase I study determine high amount study drug , ON 01910.Na , safety give patient high risk myelodysplastic syndrome ( MDS ) refractory leukemia . Patients receive ON 01910.Na ( start dose 650 mg/m2 ) intravenously 3-day continuous infusion every 2 week . Successive course use long infusion time and/or high dos drug toxicity , effectiveness , ineffectiveness recognize . In addition , amount drug blood measure , antitumor activity document , biological effect ON 01910.Na cell-cycle pathway evaluate peripheral blood mononuclear cell .
